content.en: MRI Reconstruction Enhancements: Researchers have found that using a subset selection strategy can improve the signal-to-noise ratio and reduce artifacts in MRI reconstruction. Another study has shown that an efficient sampling pattern design method can enhance image reconstruction in parallel MRI. Additionally, algorithms that utilize data consistency error as a metric have been found to be effective in selecting reconstruction parameters in parallel imaging. These findings highlight the potential of algorithms to improve the quality and efficiency of MRI imaging techniques.
content.da: Forbedringer i MR-gengivelse: Forskere har fundet ud af, at anvendelse af en delmængde-selektionsstrategi kan forbedre signal-til-støj-forholdet og reducere artefakter i MR-gengivelse. En anden undersøgelse har vist, at en effektiv designmetode for prøveudtagningsmønstre kan forbedre billedgengivelsen i parallel MR. Desuden har algoritmer, der bruger datakonsistensfejl som en metrisk, vist sig at være effektive til at vælge gengivelsesparametre i parallel billeddannelse. Disse fund understreger algoritmernes potentiale til at forbedre kvaliteten og effektiviteten af MR-billedteknikker.
